website_summaries.verdict: With a user-friendly design and a price that is lower than competitors with similar quality, the Champion is a solid deal.
pros: Powerful yet easy to maneuver, start, and use
Suitable for numerous tasks around the house
Has a lot to offer for a reasonable price
cons: Only comes with 3 changeable nozzles compared to some competitors' 5 nozzles, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: This Champion was an awesome choice. It is powerful and portable and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a friends washer and decided I needed my own. This Champion was an awesome choice. It is powerful and portable and easy to operate. It started on the second pull and works just like I'd hoped. My sons are already taking dibbs on who gets to use it next. I don't know why I waited so long to get this Champion pressure washer. It does what its advertised. 2600 psi is more than enough for any household project on my to do list. What a great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The engine quickly gets so hot that if the pressurized hose gets near it (which it usually is), it will melt a hole in your hose. So figure in cost for a replacement hose every couple of times you run it.
customer_reviews.author: Hale

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would of given it 5 stars but the provided funnel needed to fill the engine oil was cracked. Unfortunately, I didn't immediately notice and had an oil mess.
customer_reviews.author: Score Schneekloth

customer_reviews.title: It was a winner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for husband for Fathers Day. Was opened and used within an hour of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom

customer_reviews.title: Compact well built washer
customer_reviews.text: This power washer was easy to put together.It is a very compact unit.I washed vinyl siding on two houses.It performed well,but there is a noticeable difference from my last washer that was 3100 psi.It is great for a single story house.On the two story I had to use a ladder to get up higher to get the siding clean.Overall it is a good quality machine.Only comes with three nozzle tips which will take care of most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: This thing packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my pressure washer today! This thing is so powerful and sleek. I will definitely be ordering other power equipment products from Champion.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. After adding gas and oil it started up first pull out of the box. Motor runs really well, and has plenty of power. I’ve run it twice for about 2 hours each time and it was flawless. Defined satisfied with this machine. Only thing missing is a soap tank but it does come with the line to put into a tank. Good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Battle

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 13 year old 2300 PSI machine that finally gave up the ghost. I had no idea what had changed in the last 13 years. What a difference!!! The old one died half way through cleaning my 20'x 20' deck. With the Champion, I finished in half the time it took to do the first half. Setting up the machine was simple. Instructions were easy to follow and it started on the first pull. Great power, great price. Wish I'd bought sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Makes everything new
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and bought our own power washer. I've used this thing so much the few months we've had it! Bought it for a huge play structure stripping project. Worked great and saved a lot of time. Then while I was at it, power washed the siding of the house. Made our white shutters look new again. Along with our patio furniture! This thing was so nice I pretty much washed everything!! So nice for cars too, especially being in a dirt road. Made our pavers look new again too. This is so easy to use and does so much. Saves a lot of time you would otherwise be scrubbing. Haven't had an issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pressure washer on my truck and my deck & atv's. Works great. No complaints. Very easy to start and is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little power washer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little power washer for the price! Soap can only be used with the low pressure nozzle, the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Champion 2600-PSI 2.2-GPM Dolly-Style Gas Pressure Washer
product_meta.description: The Champion Power Equipment 100382 2600-PSI 2.2-GPM Dolly-Style Gas Powered Pressure Washer provides cost-effective, “do-it-yourself” cleaning power. The combination of practical features with high-performance components results in better cleaning with less effort for all your outdoor projects. This 2600 PSI pressure washer performs well under pressure no matter what the job. Whether your outdoor cleaning project involves your patio, deck, outdoor furniture, siding, fence, driveway, car, truck, boat, RV, farm equipment or something else, Champion’s dolly-style pressure washer is designed for performance. It’s important to have the right nozzle for the job, since the size of the nozzle affects water flow and pressure. The three quick-connect nozzles (0˚, 25˚, soap) ensure maximum cleaning performance for any type of job. Extend your reach with the included 25-foot high-pressure hose and use cleaning detergents hassle-free with the 4-foot detergent hose. The Annovi Reverberi axial cam pump is designed for high performance and long pump life and will ensure steady nozzle pressure for consistent cleaning performance. Champion’s lightweight and compact design along with the never-flat tires make this pressure washer easy to maneuver. The cleverly designed onboard storage for the high-pressure hose, trigger gun and spray wand ensure you’ll have what you need when you need it, plus you’ll be able to keep moving without having to stop and put things away. The cast-iron sleeve and durable steel frame are built to last. Powered by a 196cc Champion single-cylinder OHV engine with a 0.9-gallon fuel tank and designed with a low oil shut-off sensor, this unit has a 0.6 qt. oil capacity (recommended 10W-30). This pressure washer is EPA certified and CARB compliant. Buy with confidence - Champion Support and our nationwide network of service centers will back your purchase up with a 2-year limited warranty and FREE lifetime technical support.
feature_bullets: Powerful – 2600 PSI with 2.2 GPM backed by Champion’s 196cc single-cylinder OHV engine
Versatile – Trigger gun, wand, three nozzles (0˚, 25˚, soap), 25-foot high pressure hose and 4-foot detergent hose are all at your disposal to handle a variety of jobs
Hassle-Free – Ergonomic comfort grip trigger gun reduces fatigue, plus convenient onboard storage for the high pressure hose, trigger gun and spray wand
Quality – High-performance Annovi Reverberi axial cam pump provides steady nozzle pressure for consistent cleaning
Champion Support – Includes 2-year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support from dedicated experts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
